Title: Unyielding Fists: Trial of Stone
Description:
You have accomplished much in the short time you have been here, $n. I would not normally offer this test so soon... but I feel that you're ready.

It is time you attempted the Trial of Stone.
ObjectivesText: Speak with Master Bruised Paw, then successfully strike the Stack of Stone Blocks 5 times.
CompletionText:
This test will be trying. You will test the strength of your fists against the strength of stone. Steel yourself, $n.

Not literally, of course.

Unless you normally wear steel gloves... in which case, you may literally steel yourself.
RewardText:
<Master Bruised Paw bows before you.>

Stone quivers and breaks beneath your fists. You have the power to move mountains, if you so desire.

There is nothing more I can teach you.

Objectives.Text: Strike the Stack of Stone Blocks
